title: We may be able to help you rent an apartment home!
posting_body: :-(  You still have to copy-and-paste this link into the address bar on your web browser.
We may be able to help you rent an apartment home.
16000 West Nine Mile Rd - 100, Southfield, MI, 48075
Schedule a call to discuss Immediate Availability
Must gross 4x rent per month in income with an acceptable background.
.We give people with a hic-up in their life’s journey an opportunity to start over again.
- We all know someone who deserves a second chance and we love being part of their rebound.
-We enable an applicant the ability to live in a Desired Home that may be close to their employment and/or school district, etc.
- Low Credit Rents will help you repair your credit if you complete your lease.
